page.title: 18SEESWOOD POOL
page.content: If you went to Seeswood Pool you would be sure to see birds upon the water,plus geese coming and going.If you walked along the banks you would see the anglers fishing.You would see the farm and the cows too.If you went at about 6 o'clock you would see the fish jumping to catch flies and water spiders too.I wouldn't go when it's raining heavily because the pool rises quickly.If you walk in the fields around the pool then take care not to step into a cow pat.There are stiles to take you,from one field to another,but it would take you a while to get over them because at each side of the stile there is a lot of mud.If you put your foot in the mud your shoe could possibly come off.Seeswood Pool is an interesting place to go for a walk,or for fishing, bird watching,or simply for a picnic.
